pages.text: Deep luminis is a somewhat rare variant of luminis. It can be found in around 1/33 luminis ores, but it isn't always those odds, as it can vary based on your gear and curios. You can also find it by exploding blocks of normal luminis, although this is costly.

Just like normal luminis, when smelted, the deep luminis solidifies and begins to give off a glow. While this kind of luminis isn't used in Buddycards, because of it's high concentration of luminis though, it can be used to upgrade buddysteel.
